short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension built with React to summarize the selected web page sections for you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension built with React to ask questions on the selected web page sections after loading the text in the extension by clicking on the load text button.Select the text on the screen and then open the extension and click on load button. You can start asking questions on your text like a normal chat. The bot accepts text prompts and voice prompts translated to text after the text has been loaded.
